title: Refund Tokens
body: Could you (Riot) look into a solution to this problem? Maybe a token or two a season or four tokens every two years or something? I have ran into the unpleasant situation where I have no tokens and made an accidental purchase. I know as a company you can't put yourself in a financial risk to lose money, so of course protect yourself but also help the people who help you. Thank you. have a nice and blessed day. Sorry if this seems jerkish.

replies.body:
It's certainly unfortunate when an accidental purchase happens, and the refund tokens are intended to be used in such a case. 

If you feel very strongly about this suggestion, I encourage you to post the idea on [Miscellaneous](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) where suggestions are intended to go and where this will get more visibility. Let me know if you have any questions.
